summary: Eric, a football fanatic postman whose life is descending into crisis, receives some life coaching from the famously philosophical Eric Cantona.
cast: Steve Evets|Eric Cantona|Stephanie Bishop|Gerard Kearns|Stefan Gumbs|Lucy-Jo Hudson|Cole Williams|Dylan Williams|Matthew McNulty|Laura Ainsworth|Max Beesley Snr|Kelly Bowland|Julie Brown|John Henshaw|Justin Moorhouse|Des Sharples|Greg Cook|Mick Ferry|Smug Roberts|Johnny Travis|Steve Marsh|Cleveland Campbell|Ryan Pope|Omar Abdul|Adam Beresford|Ciaran Clancy|Steve Cook|Sheila Diamond|Marvin Gilbert|Ben Jackson|Wendy Kennedy|Trevor Dwyer-Lynch|Jake Manning|Tom Meredith|Eddie Riley|Conor Saunders|Venn Tracey|Guy Wills|David Beckham|Nicky Butt|Denis Irwin|David James|Brian McClair
title: Buscando a Eric
